lcInstruction.p: In the previous lesson, your first test build with the DITA OT used the pdf2 plugin. The following instructions show you how to use the DITA OT to see the differences between PDF output generated from a map and PDF output generated from a bookmap.

task.title: Generating PDF output on a PC

step.cmd: Type the following commands into your command window:
Press ENTER to run the DITA Open Toolkit.
Navigate to your "ducks_output" folder and locate the PDF file you just generated, b_ducks.pdf.
Open both b_ducks.pdf and m_ducks.pdf in a PDF viewer.

info.p: Note the way the DITA OT's default PDF plugin displays output from bookmaps versus output from maps. Although both the map and the bookmap contain the same content, the PDF files look different.
